name: Purple Slime
speed: walk 20 ft., climb 10 ft., swim 30 ft.
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

trait.name: Amorphous
text: The purple slime can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Amphibious
text: The purple slime can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Underwater Camouflage
text: The purple slime has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The purple slime makes two spike attacks.

action.name: Spike
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage and 10 (3d6) poison damage.

In addition, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or its Strength score is reduced by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.
